.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_4_testing_plot_4_robustness_reg.py:


Robustness:  Regression
=====================================

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 8-9

Experiment initialization and data preparation

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 9-17

.. code-block:: default

    from piml import Experiment
    from piml.models import FIGSRegressor

    exp = Experiment()
    exp.data_loader(data="BikeSharing", silent=True)
    exp.data_summary(feature_exclude=["yr", "mnth", "temp"], silent=True)
    exp.data_prepare(target="cnt", task_type="regression", silent=True)








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 18-19

Train Model

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 19-21

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_train(FIGSRegressor(max_iter=100, max_depth=5), name="FIGS")








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 22-23

Robustness test with all features being perturbed

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 23-26

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="FIGS", show='robustness_perf', perturb_features=None,
                       perturb_method="raw", metric="MSE", perturb_size=0.1, figsize=(6, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_robustness_reg_001.png
   :alt: Model Performance: Perturb on All Features
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_robustness_reg_001.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 27-28

Robustness test with custom perturbation features

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 28-31

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="FIGS", show="robustness_perf", perturb_features=["hr", "atemp"],
                       perturb_method='raw', metric="MSE", perturb_size=0.1,  figsize=(6, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_robustness_reg_002.png
   :alt: Model Performance: Perturb on 2 Features
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_robustness_reg_002.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 32-33

Robustness test with custom perturbation size

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 33-36

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="FIGS", show="robustness_perf", perturb_features=None,
                       perturb_method="raw", metric="MSE", perturb_size=0.2, figsize=(6, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_robustness_reg_003.png
   :alt: Model Performance: Perturb on All Features

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 37-38

Robustness test with custom perturbation method

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 38-41

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="FIGS", show="robustness_perf", perturb_features=None,
                       perturb_method="quantile", metric="MSE", perturb_size=0.1, figsize=(6, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_robustness_reg_004.png

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 42-43

Robustness test with custom metrics

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 43-46

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="FIGS", show="robustness_perf", perturb_features=None,
                       perturb_method="raw", metric="R2", perturb_size=0.1, figsize=(6, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_robustness_reg_005.png
   :alt: Model Performance: Perturb on All Features
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_robustness_reg_005.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 47-48

Robustness test on worst-alpha percent samples

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 48-50

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_diagnose(model="FIGS", show="robustness_perf_worst", perturb_features=None,
                       perturb_method="raw", metric="MSE", perturb_size=0.1, alpha=0.3, figsize=(6, 4))



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_robustness_reg_006.png
   :alt: 30%-Worst Sample Performance
   :srcset: /auto_examples/4_testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_robustness_reg_006.png
